narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "C " license.
  
The license fee of $175.00 should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
No Regulated Activity may be conducted until a valid license is obtained.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
